name: Desert Havoc
description:
A low-poly shoot-em-up short game where it's just you or them. Take that gun of yours and spray them with lead, show no mercy. 

Enemies randomly spawn on the map and immediately start to follow and attack you (only when they're near to you) regardless where they spawn on the map. Don't worry, you have room to breathe and sufficient time to kill them and defend yourself.
